question: The chart displays the number of working days lost over several years due to industrial actions world-wide. Based on this data, which of the following conclusions can be made?

options.A: The number of working days lost in 2011-12 is nearly four times that lost in 2010-11.
options.B: The number of working days lost in 2007-08 is the second-highest among all the years shown.
options.C: The number of working days lost in 2008-09 is the lowest among all the years shown.
options.D: The number of working days lost in 2008-09 are more than 2009-10.

explanation: The chart uses dual encoding through both size and color, exaggerating the visual differences. Option A is misleading due to this visual exaggeration.
